views.originalSql: select category, domain_name, sophos_pid, sophos_tid, subcategory, time, stream_ingest_date,  ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform,meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id,internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name='dns_activity'

select category, change_time, creation_time,file,file_attributes,file_extension,file_id,file_size,file_type,file_type_name,last_access_time,last_write_time,number_of_hard_links,path,path_type,path_type_name,sha256,sophos_pid,sophos_tid,subcategory,subject,target_file,target_file_extension,target_path,time,stream_ingest_date,ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name='file_activity'

select address_type_name,bytes_received,bytes_sent,category,destination_ip,destination_port,end_time,protocol,protocol_name,sophos_pid,source_ip,source_port,start_time,subcategory,stream_ingest_date, ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name='network_activity' or query_name='sophos_network_activity_windows'

select category,cmdline,file_size,global_rep,local_rep,ml_score,name,parent_cmdline,parent_name,parent_path,parent,parent_sophos_pid,parent_start_time,path,pid,pua_score,sha1,sha256,sophos_pid,starting_integrity_level,starting_integrity_level_name,subcategory,time,user_sid,username,company_name,file_description,file_version,original_filename,is_process_file_signed,local_rep_data,product_name,stream_ingest_date,ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name IN ('running_processes_windows_sophos', 'running_processes_linux_events')

select category,sophos_pid,subcategory,task_content,task_name,time,username,stream_ingest_date,ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name='scheduled_task_activity'

select category,new_service_value,parent_sophos_pid,service_account,service_name,service_path,service_start_type,service_start_type_name,service_type_enum,service_type_name,sophos_pid,subcategory,time,user_domain,user_sid,username,stream_ingest_date,ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name='service_activity'

select category,sophos_pid,sophos_tid,subcategory,time,url,stream_ingest_date,ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name IN ('url_activity','sophos_url_activity_windows')

select account_expires, allowed_to_delegate_to, category, display_name, home_directory, home_path, logon_hours, new_uac_value, old_uac_value, password_last_set, primary_group_id, privilege_list, profile_path, sam_account_name, sid_history, script_path, sophos_pid, subcategory, target_domain, target_sid, target_username, time, uac, user_domain, user_logon_id, user_parameters, user_principal_name, user_sid, user_workstations, username, stream_ingest_date,ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name IN ('account_activity','user_events_linux')

select authentication_package, category, elevated_token, executing_sophos_pid, failure_reason, impersonation_level, key_length, lm_package, logon_guid, logon_hours, logon_id, logon_process, logon_type, process_path, remote_address, remote_port, restricted_admin_mode, sophos_pid, status, sub_status, subcategory, target_domain, target_linked_logon_id, target_logon_id, target_outbound_domain, target_outbound_username, target_sid, target_username, time, transmitted_services, user_domain, user_sid, username, virtual_account, workstation_name, stream_ingest_date, ingestion_timestamp, message_identifier, record_identifier, unix_time as event_time, folded, meta_boot_time as boot_time, meta_hostname as hostname, meta_os_name as os_name, meta_os_platform as os_platform, meta_os_version as os_version, meta_public_ip as public_ip, meta_endpoint_type as endpoint_type, meta_domain_controller as domain_controller, customer_id, endpoint_id, internal_customer_id, timestamp_nano from symlink_xdr_ext_data where query_name='authentication_activity'
